page.title: 15WINSTANLEY-Some Statistcs
page.content:
Data derived from random sample of 100 residents by means of a questionnaire.
{RELIGION}- 47% C of E:43% RC:9% other: 1% none {LEISURE}- 86% of sample stated that the area lacked children's facilities. Adult activities (listed in ranked order) Male - sport,TV,garden,pub,reading Female - hobbies,TV,reading,garden {HOLIDAYS}- 4% hardly ever;33% some- times;63% annually {MOTORING}- 87% car-owners(84% husbands qualified drivers;54% wives can drive) {PET OWNERS}- 59% own pet of some kind. Most popular pet : Dog(35% of sample) {SHOPPING}- 85% travel out of area for most needs even though it has its own small precinct.
